metadata.title: CVE-2024-54543

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Development Tools 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP6

metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in visionOS 2.2, tvOS 18.2, Safari 18.2, watchOS 11.2, iOS 18.2 and iPadOS 18.2, macOS Sequoia 15.2. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to memory corruption.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP6 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6 is installed
